name: My Big Sur upgrade went well. At least for me, everything is actually working *better* after the upgrade, especially Mail.app. I know there have been mixed reviews on the new look, but I like it overall.

content.html: My Big Sur upgrade went well. At least for me, everything is actually working *better* after the upgrade, especially Mail.app. I know there have been mixed reviews on the new look, but I like it overall.
content.value: My Big Sur upgrade went well. At least for me, everything is actually working *better* after the upgrade, especially Mail.app. I know there have been mixed reviews on the new look, but I like it overall.

summary: Well, bolstered by my favorite, trusted IT reviewer, it may be time to consider an upgrade. But not on this lovely quiet Saturday. Not a day to borrow trouble or to start sawing the OS table legs. Thanks for the post — I’m glad it went well!
